languages.text: "Мною было получено приглашение на свершение совместного омовения. Омовение невозможно свершить без погружения в купальную емкость".
"I have received an invitation to perform collective ablutions. Ablutions are impossible to perform without submerging into the bathing receptacle."
languages.original_text: "Мною было получено приглашение на свершение совместного омовения. Омовение невозможно свершить без погружения в купальную емкость".

traits.locale_text: "I have received an invitation to perform collective ablutions. Ablutions are impossible to perform without submerging into the bathing receptacle."

languages.text: « On m'a invité à prendre part à des ablutions collectives, une pratique qui nécessite de se submerger dans le réceptacle rempli d'eau à cet effet. »
languages.original_text: "I have received an invitation to perform collective ablutions. Ablutions are impossible to perform without submerging into the bathing receptacle."

traits.locale_text: « On m'a invité à prendre part à des ablutions collectives, une pratique qui nécessite de se submerger dans le réceptacle rempli d'eau à cet effet. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «He recibido una invitación para la realización de abluciones conjuntas. Es necesario sumergirse en el receptáculo de baño para realizar la ablución».
languages.original_text: "I have received an invitation to perform collective ablutions. Ablutions are impossible to perform without submerging into the bathing receptacle."

traits.locale_text: «He recibido una invitación para la realización de abluciones conjuntas. Es necesario sumergirse en el receptáculo de baño para realizar la ablución».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我收到了共同沐浴的邀请。如果不泡在浴缸里，就无法执行沐浴协议。”
languages.original_text: "I have received an invitation to perform collective ablutions. Ablutions are impossible to perform without submerging into the bathing receptacle."

traits.locale_text: “我收到了共同沐浴的邀请。如果不泡在浴缸里，就无法执行沐浴协议。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「集団沐浴の招待状が届きました。沐浴は浴槽に浸からないとできません」
languages.original_text: "I have received an invitation to perform collective ablutions. Ablutions are impossible to perform without submerging into the bathing receptacle."

traits.locale_text: 「集団沐浴の招待状が届きました。沐浴は浴槽に浸からないとできません」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe eine Einladung erhalten, kollektive Waschungen vorzunehmen. Waschungen lassen sich ohne ein Eintauchen in das Badebehältnis nicht durchführen."
languages.original_text: "I have received an invitation to perform collective ablutions. Ablutions are impossible to perform without submerging into the bathing receptacle."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe eine Einladung erhalten, kollektive Waschungen vorzunehmen. Waschungen lassen sich ohne ein Eintauchen in das Badebehältnis nicht durchführen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Çoklu taharet ayini gerçekleştirmek üzere davet edildim. Taharet ayinlerinin banyo haznesindeki suyun içine girilmeden gerçekleştirilmesi olanaklı değildir."
languages.original_text: "I have received an invitation to perform collective ablutions. Ablutions are impossible to perform without submerging into the bathing receptacle."
